name: torn-thread-notifier
description: Chrome extension to monitor Torn forum threads and notify on new posts

scripts.build: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox
scripts.package: npm run build && node scripts/package.js chrome && node scripts/package.js firefox
scripts.package:chrome: npm run build:chrome && node scripts/package.js chrome
scripts.package:firefox: npm run build:firefox && node scripts/package.js firefox
